snippet: A well-attended and extraordinary race in China still has not wiped out doubts about the Bahrain Grand Prix next weekend. Did Formula One miss its chance to leave China riding a new-found wave of popularity?
abstract: A well-attended and extraordinary race in China still has not wiped out doubts about the Bahrain Grand Prix next weekend. Did Formula One miss its chance to leave China riding a new-found wave of popularity?

headline.main: A Great Show in China, a Lingering Cloud Over Bahrain
